snippet.title: Immortal Hunters - Official Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: See gameplay against terrifying beasts in this new Immortal Hunters trailer for the upcoming co-op beat'em up action RPG that is headed to Steam and Indie.io. People killed the underground god, stole his power and built a civilization ruled by the Church which is served by powerful immortal Hunters. Choose your hero, survive the apocalypse, fight, find a reborn god, expose the lies of the Cardinals.
